entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support Include3rdPartyDLLForSelfExtract for NativeAoT #39202

Closed

  • Code-style analysis rules not included with `AnalysisLevel` = `latest` #37569
  • Update Application-Insights dependency to 2.22 #38513
  • Application.ProductVersion in .NET 8.0.201 returns incorrect value in Windows 11 and c#. #39214

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to 8.0.204 #39232
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #39231
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #39230
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #39229
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #39228
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.118 #39221
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.421 #39220
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.129 #39219
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Compress all assets by default #39213
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Create a new label with TFM of the app and the SDK used to build the image #39196
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • make globalized, AOT apps no longer require nightly #39195
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update branding to 7.0.315 #39222
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.408 #39223
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.104 #39224
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.203 #39225
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Swap 9.0 to current target framework for analysis #38754
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix SLN structure from src/Tests to test #39226
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Application-Insights to 2.22 #38638
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview2] Disable package aliasing tests #39190
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add Install Records for VS Managed Workloads During 'Update' #38346
    Area-Workloads
  • Move dotnet/format to dotnet/sdk #38857
    untriaged
  • Hide workload update message Fixes #37520 #39185
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Use a more reasonable timeout for HttpClient operations for Container Registry interactions #38938
    Area-Containers
  • Add an image digest label to generated containers #39160
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Installer to SDK merge - Phase 1 #38804
    untriaged
  • Trim trailing .git from sourcelink repo urls in container generation #39161
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Containers
